name: 147漫画(仅支持1.1.6.6+)
request: https://m.i2356.com/search/?keywords={key}@charset->UTF-8@header->user-agent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/86.0.4240.198 Safari/537.36

search.title: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'div.itemTxt > a');}
search.url: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'div.itemTxt > a@attr->href')+'@header->user-agent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/86.0.4240.198 Safari/537.36';}

detail.author: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'div.comic-view.clearfix > div.view-sub.autoHeight > div > dl:nth-child(3) > dd');}
detail.upDate: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'div.comic-view.clearfix > div.view-sub.autoHeight > div > dl:nth-child(5) > dd');}

comic.url: function Main(text){var img = jsoup(text,'mip-link > img@attr->src');if((img+'').length < 1){img = jsoup(text,'mip-link > mip-img:not([style],[width])@attr->src');}if(img.indexOf('cover')==-1){return img;}return null};
